E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.	The assistant should hold one leg or tie it to the left side to ensure that the body does not extend during the extraction of the child.
E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.	You should moisten the woman's mouth with oils and poultices made from althea, fennel, and other seeds.
E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.	You should anoint the midwife's hand with those oils and poultices, you should enter your hand into the woman with ease, and you should surround the area where the fingers will be inserted in the child.
E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	In the appropriate place: then consider whether the child is prepared to be delivered on its head, and you shall insert your fingers in the heels, neck, mouth, palate, under the beard, in the crook of its arm, near the ribs, or beneath the hip bones.
Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.	But if it is to be delivered on its feet, you shall insert in the ankles or the middle of the ribs.
E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.	It is necessary that you hold the finger with your right hand, and bend its curvature in the location between the fingers of your left hand, and enter your hand with ease and insert the finger into one of the places we have mentioned, until it reaches the desired result.
E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.	And place another hand or the third one if necessary on the abdomen of the patient, to prevent distention but not extension according to its natural length.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	It should be good all around, in order that the swelling may be alleviated as much as possible, just like it is done when extracting a tooth and rooting it out.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	It is necessary for him that what is between [the swelling and the affected area] should be softened; and if any part of it is retained, then it is necessary that the midwife anoint some oil on her fingers and gently massage the affected area and rub the retained part.
Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	Therefore, if the birth is forgotten, the fingers should be pressed into the place that is deeper inside; and do this until everything has been expelled.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	But if the hand is outside the other and it cannot be reduced by pressure, then a cloth should be wrapped around it; and extract it until it has all been expelled, either at the joint of the hand or at the coccyx.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And in the same way, do this to the other hand and both feet.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.	But if the head of the fetus is large, or it happens that pressure can be applied to the swelling, or water is collected at the head, then insert between the blades of the spine spreader and cut the head and drain the water, or break it with an instrument called "alundat", the shape of which will come in the chapter that follows this one.
E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	Do the same if the fetus is large-headed by nature: and then insert it with an instrument called "algeometre", or take it out with an alundat as mentioned before, and extract the bones with forceps.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	And if the head is swollen and contracted by the furculum, then it should be cut open until the moisture that is in the feet has been drained.
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	But if there are no complications and it is not swollen or enlarged, then you should cut the head immediately as soon as it is possible for you to do so.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	And if the afterbirth is everted or in the wrong place, then it is necessary that you perforate it to drain the moisture that is in it.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	But if the fetus is on its feet, then the extraction of it is easy and the direction to the mother's mouth is easy.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.	But if the fetus is contracted in the abdomen and feet, then it is necessary that you extract it with a cloth that you will wrap around your hand, and cut the abdomen and feet to let the fluid that is in them flow out.
Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.	But if the other limbs are stuck and the head turns, then the midwife should insert her left hand; but if the mouth of the mother is obstructed, then insert your hand in the anus of the fetus and find the head with it, and pull it towards the mouth of the mother, and place a finger or two fingers inside, and pull it with them.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.	And if the mouth of the mother is obstructed by an afterbirth that is in the umbilicus, then it is necessary not to rub it; instead, administer a moist and oily emulsion.
E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	Apply plasters; and follow the patient in waters that soften and moisten.
E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.	And if the fetus is on the side, then pierce it if possible; and administer what has been mentioned in the living fetus.
E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	And if that is not possible, cut it into pieces and extract it.
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	It is necessary to avoid any cause within the second childbirth.
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	And when you have completed your work, administer what has been said about the treatment of afterbirths that occur in the mother.
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	And if there is bleeding, then send to a stytic water and administer the other treatment.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	And I have seen a woman in the belly of which there was a dead fetus, and above that fire another one observed.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	After a long time there was an afterbirth in the navel of the uterus; and it swelled so much that it burst into fire, and began to emit smoke.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	And I was called to cure it, and treated it for a long time, but the wound did not heal.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	Then I applied some powerful plasters with strong adhesive to it, and extracted a bone from it, and after several days, I extracted another bone; and I was greatly surprised because there is no bone in the womb.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	And then I thought that they were the bones of the dead fetus.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	And so the wound healed, and many small bones were extracted from it, the woman living in that condition for a long time, but recovering gradually with a slight loss of arm.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	And I did not wonder about that, since in such cases there is knowledge and help for the doctor when administering treatment with his hand.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	In the shapes of the instruments that are necessary to extract the fetus.
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	Shape of the lever used to open the mother:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the form of strangulation in which the veins are compressed, at which compression there are two benefits in the extremities of two feet.
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	Perhaps this benefit should be more subtle with a constrictor, and it should be made of ivy or hazelwood stick.
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	The diameter of each stick should be two fingers and the edge of both sticks one finger, and the length of each is a little over a palm; in the middle of the two sticks there are two adjustments of that same stick which have already been fastened, the length of which is a little more than the width of a palm, and the diameter of each is slightly more than two fingers.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	And these two adjustments should be inserted into the mother's mouth to open it with those when you perform the prescribed benefits.
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Another similar form, but more subtle and lighter:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	Make it from ivy or hazelwood sticks in the likeness of forceps.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	However, at the end of it (the instrument) there should be two extensions like this, and the length of these extensions is a little over a palm, and the diameter of each is two fingers.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	And when you want to open the mother with it (the instrument), you should first position the woman on a bed, with her legs raised and apart, and open the space between them.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	Then place your hand on the instrument in a manner similar to when you forceps compress, according to the width that you want for the mouth of the mother up to which the metal will be inserted.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The form of vertebral manipulation that the ancients called:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	The form of impulsion with which one pushes something:
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	The form for anamnesis, in which the head is crushed:
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	And it resembles forceps at the end, like this at times, and sometimes it is made long like forceps according to this form, like this at times, at the end of which are teeth like the teeth of a vice, with which it is inserted and crushed.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	The form of brief anamnesis:
Forma de unci havent una spina:	The form of incision with a spine:
Forma de unci havent doas spinas:	The form of incision with two spines:
Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:	The form of forceps with teeth of scissors, in which the head of the instrument is crushed:
Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:	The form of a spatula having two extremities, at which the head is separated:
Forma de dos espatums latz:	The form of two spatulas wide:
Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.	All those instruments are exercised, and when there are many species of that instrument and they are prepared, the craftsman should be as light in his operation and as much as possible according to the quantity of men.
E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.	And do not neglect any of those instruments, for the necessity of them is not to be excused.
De extraccio de la segondina.	On the extraction of the second tooth:
Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.	When the second tooth is retained, it is necessary to order the patient to hold their jaw open, and then you should command that person to cough, and firmly press your hand on their mouth and nose, and if by doing so it has gone beyond (the tooth), good.
E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.	And if not, you should take a woolen cloth and perforate it with a hole, and place the herbs that are used to open the mouth of the mother, such as calamint, chamomile, anise, camomilla, scicadus arabicus, cassia lignea, and santaurea, in that hole.
Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.	All these herbs or some of them are submerged in water during the tide, and place that one on fire.
E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.	Then insert a funnel made of cane into the mother's mouth and keep it in until the vapour comes to the concave part of the womb.
E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.	Then let that vomit similarly as we have said, and the second one will come out quickly.
Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.	If the treatment remains close and is not evacuated, then command the midwife to immerse her left hand in olive oil or alum solution, and insert it into the cavity and seek the second one (finger), and when you find it, take it out little by little... If it is attached to the mother's anus, then insert the hand as recommended, and when you find the second finger, extract it little by little so that the mother does not suffer severe pain.
Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.	Then lubricate both right and left hands with ease.
E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.	Adjust the amount of attraction so that it obeys and evacuates from adherence.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.	If the mother's mouth is constricted, we have already recommended the treatment with stirring and medication of water with herbs.
Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.	If none of the causes we have recommended is forgotten, then be careful not to overdo it in the process of extraction, but what comes out of her must be placed in the woman's vagina and anointed with oil and tetraformula; for it will heat up within a few days and dissolve and be forgotten.
Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.	When it becomes hot, the evil authority is raised to the head and stomach, and then it torments the patient; therefore, they should be administered sub-fumigations and appropriate treatments.
Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.	Moreover, among the ancients, sub-fumigation with cinnamon and dried figs has already been spoken of.
Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:	The shape of the instrument by which the woman is sub-fumigated should be used to retain menstruation and the second one (finger):
Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.	Made of metal or wood.
E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.	It should be stopped at the thin end inside the cavity and the wide end above the fire, and the sub-fumigation should be placed on the arms of the fire.
E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.	It should contain whatever is consumed by the sub-fumigation, and another one follows.
De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.	Treatment for an unperforated child's bottom.
Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.	Newborn children and those whose bottoms are not perforated, which must be treated with care and attention.
Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.	Therefore, the midwife should pierce that opening with her own finger; and if not, she should pierce it with a sharp spatula, and make sure not to touch the rectum.
E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.	Place some wool soaked in wine and oil over it; and anoint it with oil inside, until it heals.
Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.	If you fear that it is obstructed, then pierce a cannula for several days and stop when the child wants to relieve itself.
E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.	Occasionally there is obstruction of the bottom due to plague or abscess; therefore, that obstruction should be incised, and it should be treated with what has been said about the treatment and lead.
De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	Treatment for fistulas that occur afterwards.
Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	Fistulas that occur after the delivery are not painful and thick, those that occur near the anus or in the space of one delivery.
E es una fistula o motas.	It is a fistula or moles.
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	If the thickening is old and has become damp with white, foul-smelling pus or subtle ulcers, some of these fistulas penetrate.
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	Those that penetrate are recognized by what comes out of them during discharge and by the odor; and sometimes the patient uses evacuation, and it is beneficial for the worms to come out.
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	Some of these fistulas occasionally penetrate into the bladder space, and into the muscle of the scrotum; and some of these fistulas penetrate into the joint of the thigh and into the knot of the buttock.
E aquo en que es conoguda fistula penetrant entro al cul e no-penetrant, es que tu metas le tieu dit endic en le cul, e entrometas tenta subtil de eram o de ferr en la fistula quan no y es turtuositat.	That in which a fistula penetrates into the anus and does not penetrate is that you put your finger in the anus, and insert a thin probe of wood or metal into the fistula when it is not turbid.
Mays si en aquela es turtuositat, lahoras entromet en aquela tenta subtil de plom o de pels de caval entro que tu sentas la tenta o le pel en le tieu dit.	If it is turbid in that one, then insert a thin probe of lead or horsehair into it until you feel the probe or the hair in your finger.
E si no sentas aquela de tot ni no procezeys del trauc alcuna causa de egestio ni verm ni ventositat, ayssi cum havem dit, lahoras sapias que es no-penetrant, e lahoras coyta te a la curacio.	If you do not feel it from top to bottom and do not perceive any cause of discharge, worms, or odor as mentioned earlier, then you know that it is not penetrating, and you can proceed with the treatment.
E quan la fistula es penetrant entro a la vesica o entro al meat de la vergua, lahoras la significacio de lu es eyssiment de urina de aquela e prohibicio de lu ad aysso que·l loc am medicina sia consolidat.	When the fistula penetrates into the bladder or muscle of the scrotum, the meaning is clearly that it is urine from that one and the place should be consolidated with medicine.
Mays si es penetrant entro la junctura de la coyssa o entro al os e envencio de dolor en le circuit, lahoras senhal de lu es que la tenta perve entro aqui si en lu no es turtuositat entro al os, e envencio de dolor en le circuit de la partida; e que de lu yeys poyredura tostemps; e que no val en aquela medicacio, ni es consolidada am enguent.	If it penetrates into the joint of the thigh or into the bone and pain occurs in the area, the sign is that the probe enters if there is no turbidity inside the bone, and pain occurs in the area around the delivery; and it becomes pus quickly; and that treatment does not work, nor is it consolidated with oil.
E en totas aquelas fistulas penetrant no es curacio de tot, e la curacio de aquelas es trebalh e vanetat dels folyls metges sobre·l qual so fermatz.	In all these penetrating fistulas there is no cure, and the treatment of them is the labor and futility of foolish doctors on which they rely.
Mays en aquela que no es penetrant e no antiqua, sanacio am ferr es sperada segon que yeu a tu recomtare, e aquo que ja yeu e proat.	In that which is not penetrating and not ancient, healing with iron is expected, as I have told you, and what I have proved.
E es que le malaute jagua entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos e eleva las cambas de lu entro sus, las coyssas sian enclinadas al ventre de lu, e aprop entromet tenta de plom, o de eram si es en la fistula turtuositat, entro que sapias le loc on perve la tenta.	The patient should lie between your hands upon his back and raise the legs into the air, with the hips inclined towards the abdomen of the patient, and then you should try to enter the cavity with lead or iron if it is in the fistula, until you know where the probe goes.
E si aquela sent le malaute entorn le cuol, lahora cove que tu entrometas le tieu dit endic en le cuol.	And if the patient feels pain around the neck, then you should insert your finger into the neck.
E si sentas en le tieu dit la tenta ja per si meteyssa descuberta penetrar, otra aquo que sentas entre le tieu dit e aquela siphac o carn, lahoras sapias certanament que aquela es penetrant; e adonc no trebalhes en aquela, quar no es en aquela sanacio, ayssi cum havem dit.	If you feel a resistance while inserting your finger to probe, or if you feel something hard with your finger, then you know for certain that it is penetrating; and do not work on that one, because healing does not exist in it, as we said.
Mays empero diyssero alcus que es sana en alcus homes tart.	But some may say that it heals in some men too.
E de la medicacio per la qual es sperat juvament en lu es que tu ignes cauteri subtil segon le ample de la fistula, ayssi cum es precedit, e intrometas aquel ignit en la fistula entro que pervengua entorn le cuol; e aprop itera aquel doas o tres vetz entro que sapias que ja son adhustas totas aquelas carns ajustadas fistuladas que so semblantz a cana de pluma de ausel.	And the medicine by which healing is expected in that one also involves igniting cautery thinly according to the size of the fistula, as previously described, and inserting that burning into the fistula until it reaches around the neck; and then you should apply it twice or thrice until you know that all the tissues adjacent to the fistula that are similar to feathers of birds are completely tightened.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder entro que en yescan totas aquelas carns que so adhustas, e aprop cura aquela am medicinas la carn engendrantz e consolidantz, e si es sanada, bo es; e sino, lahoras no es sana en degun temps per autra curacio.	And heal that one with bandages wrapped in cotton until all the tightened tissues can be seen, and heal that one with medicines to generate and consolidate flesh, and if it heals, it is good; and if not, then it is not healed within a certain time by another treatment.
E si la tenta intra, e no penetra entro·l tieu dit le qual es en le cul, e entre aquel e la tenta que es velament spes de carn o de ciphac, e vezes la fistula en aquo que siec la superficia de la codena, lahoras secca la codena del comensament de la fistula, e tu ve seccan am la tenta, e sia en la fistula entro que la seccio pervengua al loc en le qual perve la extremitat de la tenta, e per la tenta es liberat e catz.	And if the probe enters but does not penetrate into the anus with your finger, and between that and the suspected probe which may be of flesh or tissue, and sometimes the fistula is found in the scrotum where the skin surface is healed, then you should dry the skin from the beginning of the fistula, and you will see it drying along with the probe, and it should go deep into the fistula until the incision reaches the place where the tip of the probe ends, and through the probe the tissue is released and caught.
E aprop mundifiqua aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so asembladas a canula de pena de ausel e no romangua de aquelas alcuna causa.	And heal those fistulous tissues that are similar to the shaft of a bird's feather and remain without any cause.
Mays si flux de sanc vezes que vengua entre tu e la tua opperacio quan ensideysses aquelas carns, lahoras le milh que sia e del pus leugier instrument es cauterizar am foc o am medicina acuta, quar cauteri am foc ajusta bonas doas habitutz: so es adhustio de aquelas carns ajustadas, e abscizio del sanc exseccacio de las humiditatz.	But if pus flows out between you and your action when probing those tissues, then burn it with fire or an acute instrument, as cauterizing with fire is useful: it tightens the fistulous tissues, and abscesses the pus through drying of the humors.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder o en caus trissat entro que·l loc geta brac, e aprop lahoras cura la plagua am enguentz carn dura engendran e consolidan.	And heal that one with bandages wrapped in cotton or in coarse cloth until the wound is covered by scab, and then heal the ulcer with hard flesh generating and consolidating medicines.
E so medicinas en las quals so stipticitat e exseccio; quan lahoras es restaurada ja es sanada e no temes iteracio.	And the medicines in which there is stopping and drying: when it is restored, it is healed and you do not fear recurrence.
Mays si la fistula ja perve entro al preon del cul e es elonguada de lu superficia del cos, lahoras entromet le tieu dit en le cul e inquireys am aquel.	But if the fistula has entered into the anus and is extended from the surface of the body, then insert your finger into the anus and probe it.
E donc si centes la tenta e entre tu e ela es velament de ciphac o de carn, e es propda a la penetracio, lahora no es operacio en lu sino segon via di fiducia e de speransa.	And if you feel resistance and it is suspected to be tissue or flesh, and it is close to penetration, then do not operate in that one but by faith and hope.
La qual causa es aministrar en lu una de tres manieyras: o que cauterize aquela ayssi cum havem dit; o que secces aquela entro que consieguas la conquavitat de lu per que sia a tu possible entrometre las qualcas e la curacio propdana; e no procesiscas mot am seccio per so que no inscidas le lacert contenent le cuol, e que accidisque sobre le malaute eyssiment de la egistio ses voluntat; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit quar fort leu sira sanat; o que elongues aquel velament e mondes aquel pus que seccas aquel entro prop le cul, ayssi cum havem dit, o am tenta o am autre instrument de aguda extremitat, e aprop mondifique aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so en la seccio entro la on podes am percrustacio; e aprop esforsa te a far la restauracio de tota la plagua am seccio, e si le orrifici pus desus no es consolidat, e romangua la fistula uberta en la partida del cul, e sira pus leugier per le malaute.	The cause is administered in one of three ways: either you cauterize it as previously mentioned; or you cut it until you obtain the concavity of it so that it is possible for you to enter and cure it properly; and do not proceed with cutting beyond the scrotum, because if you penetrate the rectum involuntarily, and it causes pain to the patient immediately and without his will; and heal it with what has been mentioned before, which works quickly, or stretch that tissue and clean the pus that dries close to the anus, as previously mentioned, either with a probe or another sharp instrument, and then clean those fistulous tissues in the section below where you can with percrustation; and finally, force yourself to restore the entire ulcer with cutting, and if the abscess pus is not consolidated and remains open in the division of the anus, it will be easier for the patient.
E alscunas veguadas la fistula es finida segon aquesta manieyra: es quan tu entrometas la tenta en la fistula, e es en le latz del cul entorn la superficia del cos am la codena e en le marge del cul, lahoras pren tenta de perforada extremitat, que es ayssi cum agulha de preparantz les coers segon aquesta forma:	And sometimes the fistula is closed in this manner: when you insert the probe into the fistula, and it is at the side of the anus around the skin surface on the body and near the edge of the scrotum, then you take a sharp probe with perforated tip, similar to an awl for preparing coarse cloth in this form:
e entromet en aquela fiel envolopat de v fiels o entorn aquels; e aprop entromet tenta am fiel en la fistula entro que consiegua la conquavitat de lu.	And he penetrates into that faithful envelope of five fields or around those areas; and he approaches the fistula, trying to reach its cavity until he achieves it.
Mays si es penetrant en le marge del cul prop dedintz, lahoras tu extratz le fiel de aquel trauc ayssi que tu intrometas le tieu dit en le cul; e extraguas la extremitat del fiel e ajustes las duas extremitatz essemps, e estrenh cascuna, e leyssa aquo per un dia o per dos, e quan mays inscideys le fiel en la carn, estrenh be aquel entro que aquelas carns sian inscididas las quals so entre doas extremitatz del fiel e que cajan.	If he penetrates into the margin of the anus closely, then you extract the feces from that wound so that you insert your finger into the anus; and extract the end of the feces and adjust both ends evenly, and tighten each one, and leave it for a day or two, and when the feces penetrates deeper into the flesh, tighten it within until those skins are incised which are between the ends of the feces and that they meet.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia consolidada e sanada.	Then cure the wound until it is consolidated and healed.
Mays si le orrifici de la fistula no es penetrant, lahoras fay aquel penetrar, en qualque manieyre sia a tu preparat, sino que sia mot en le preon, quar no es a tu que fassas aquo per que no inscidas le lacert; e aprop fay am aquela entro que sia sanada.	But if the orifices of the fistula are not penetrating, make it penetrate in any way you prepare, except that it is not too wide because it should not injure the ligament; and approach it until it is healed.
La forma de spatum spinos am lo qual es fenduda la fistula: la curvitat del qual es mot aguda e l’autra partida es no-aguda, per so que no inscidas aquo que no es necessari, ayssi cum vezes.	The method of spine-shaped spatula for dividing the fistula: the curvature of which is very sharp and the other part is not sharp, so that it does not injure anything unnecessary, as sometimes happens.
De sutura de emorroydas en las quals corra sanc en la inscizio de aquelas.	Stitching hemorrhoids, where blood flows during the incision of those.
Emorroydas so segon dos manieyras, quar o so entre le cul semblantz aysi que es de carbos, o quays aquelas sian cum a gras de rasim.	Hemorrhoids are of two kinds, for they can be in the anus like coal or as if it were a mass of fat.
E de aquelas so petitas e grans, e que le sanc corr de aquelas tostemps e es una, e so motas, e so fora·l cul, e en las extremitatz de lu.	And the small and large ones are those which bleed constantly and are one, and the piles that are multiple, and are outside the anus, and at the ends of it.
Mays empero aquelas que so foro le cul so segon las mes de pauca humiditat, de las quals corr aygua citrina o un petit de sanc am cos continuabla, e so segon la color del cos.	But the ones that are outside the anus occur during months with little moisture, from which a clear liquid or a small amount of blood with continuous flow comes out, and they are according to the color of the body.
E la curacio de aquela que es dedintz le cuol es que comandes al malaute que se assela e que se exprema entro que le cuol yesca e las emoroydas apparescan a tu.	And the treatment of the one that is inside the anus is to command the patient to sit and to empty it before the anus becomes raw and the hemorrhoids appear to you.
Adonc tu te coyte e suspen am uncis o que tenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, e aprop incideys aquelas deves las suas razitz.	Then you take and suspend with hooks or what you have those with your nail, and approach the incision of those, you should cut their roots.
Mays si les uncis no so tengutz en aquelas per la humiditat de lor e mollificacio de aquelas, lahoras pren aquelas am drap aspre o am coto o am flassada de lana, e extratz aquelas am les tieus ditz, e aprop inscideys aquelas e polveriza sobre lor alcunas polveras caudas aprop la inscizio, per que sian ad aquelas en loc de cauteri; o cauteriza aquelas segon que es precedit en le capitol de cauterizar.	But if the hooks are not present in those because of their moisture and softening of them, then take those with rough cloth or cotton or woolen gauze, remove those with your fingers, approach the incision of those and sprinkle some powders containing resins near the incision, to be used instead of cautery; or cauterize those according to what is preceded in the chapter on cauterization.
E aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	Then cure those with other treatment until they are healed.
E si le cul no obezeys a egressio, lahoras cristerisa le malaute am cristeri en le qual sia mordicacio petita, e sia lavat am aquel aquo que es en le cuol e que obezesca a egressio leugierament quan le malaute s’esprem.	And if the anus does not empty, then cauterize the patient with a small bite, and wash it with water that eases bowel movement when the patient squeezes.
Mays si las emorroydas so defora le cul, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiera, e es que tu prenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, o que prenguas aquelas am unci, e inscidas aquelas, e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit entro que sian sanadas.	But if the hemorrhoids are outside the anus, then the cause of them is light, and it is that you grab those with your nail, or grab those with hooks, and incise them, and cure those with water as we have said until they are healed.
E aquel que avoreys inscizio, cove que aministres sutura de lor segon aquesta manieyra: pren fiel envolopat e entromet aquel en agulha e aprop extratz las emorroydas a las partidas dessus, e fay aquel penetrar am la agulha en la razit del autra part, e envolveys las doas extramitatz del fiel en la partida pus dejos de la agulha, e so latitudinalment; e estrenh la emorroyda am strectura fort, e aprop noza le fiel e extratz la agulha.	And the one who has an incision, it is necessary to administer suture of them in this manner: take a feather and insert it into the needle and approach the hemorrhoids to the openings above, and make the feather penetrate through the opening of the other part, and envelop both ends of the feather on the side further from the needle, and transversely; tie the hemorrhoid with strong stitches, and approach the wound closed and remove the needle.
E fay aquo a totas, e layssa de aquelas una e no la cozes, per so que la superfluitat del sanc corra de aquela.	And do this for all of them, and leave one and do not sew it, so that the excess blood flows from there.
E aprop pausa sobre le cul drap enfus en oli rozat o en cerot; e pausa aquel sobre·l cuol e comanda al malaute que·s repause.	And place a cloth soaked in rose oil or wax over the anus, and place that over the anus and command the patient to rest.
E aprop layssa aquela entro que caja; e quan es casuda, cura aquelas am enguentz o am autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	And leave it inside until it closes; and when it is healed, cure them with infusions or other treatment until they are healed.
De curacio de fistulas.	Treatment of fistulas.
Motas veguadas accideys per exseccacio de fenda o per costriccio de natura.	Multiple watched over wounds occur due to lack of healing or natural constriction.
E cum so antiquadas e no val en aquela medicina, lahoras cove que tu razas aquelas am la puncta de spatum o am la tua ungla entro que sian faytas humidas e sia hostada de aquelas la escorsa pus desus, la qual prohibeys aquelas de consolidacio; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian consolidadas.	And since they are old and that medicine is not effective in them, it is necessary that you cut those with the point of spatula or your nail until they become wet and the flow is stopped above, which prevents their consolidation; and approach them until they are consolidated.
Lahoras tu osta aquelas am razio pus vehement que la primieyra entro que mot sancno e sian excoriadas; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	You remove those that are very violent with the first cautery before any blood flow and they become scabbed; and approach them until they are healed.
De curacio de almesamir, so es clau.	Treatment of anal fistulas is essential.
Sapias que alamermar, so es clau, e no es si no notz redon segon la color del cors semblant a cap de claviel, e es fayt en tot le cors e majorment en las partidas dejos les pes e als ditz, e endeve per aquels dolor deves le anament.	Know that anal abscess is essential, and it is not to be ignored according to the color of the body like the head of a nail, and it occurs throughout the body but more in the areas around the feet and chest, and it indicates pain through them.
E adonc cove que sia inscidit aquo que es en le circuit del clau, e sia tengut am les forfexs o am unci, e sia eradicat de la sua razit; e aprop cura aquel.	Therefore, it is necessary to incise what is around the nail and hold it with forceps or hooks, and be exterminated from its root; and approach it until it is healed.
E si vols, cauteriza le segont que es precedit en le sieu capitol.	If you want, cauterize the following that is preceded in its chapter.
Mays de veruca es eminencia petita aspre fistulada redonda sobre la superficia del cos, e motas veguadas veno en las mas dels enfantz.	Warts are small, rough, round elevations on the surface of the body, and they appear mostly in children.
E curacio de lu es que estendas e inscidas aquela, o que estrenhas aquela am fiel o am pel entro que caja.	The cure for it is to extend and incise it, or to constrict it with a file or a heated iron tool that fits into it.
E si vols, cauteriza aquo, segon que havem dit, am foc o am medicina acuta.	If you want, cauterize this (the wart), as I said, either with fire or with a sharp medicine.
E ja so eradicadas enversas e no-enversas am le instrument le qual yeu diyre.	Warts can be removed with the tool that I will mention.
Mays formica es eminencia petita feutrada o fistulada grossa sobre la superficia del cos anant mot en le preon, e quan le freg atroba aquela es centit en lu semblant de mordificacio de formigua, e es fayta entorn le cos.	Ants are small, pitted or large elevations on the body that move in a line and when touched, they sting like an ant bite and swell around the area.
E curacio de lu es que prenguas una canula de pena de auca o de pena de voltor, e sia fort, e pausa aquela sobre la formigua entro que la contengua le cercle de la canula de las partidas de lu; e aprop revolveys la tua ma am la canula entro que inscidas aquo que es en le circuit de la formigua, e pauses aquela en le preon de la carn, e que eradiques la formigua de la sua razit.	The cure for ants is to take a hollow cane or a reed cane and make sure it's strong. Place the canula over the ant within its circle; then turn your hand with the canula to incise the area around the ant, pressing it onto the skin, and remove the ant from its root.
E si vols, fay aquo am canula de eram o de ferr segon aquesta forma:	If you want, do this with a reed or iron rod in the following way:
Sia la partida desus de la canulha trahent a subtilitat, sorda (so es no-perforada), envolopada per so que sobre le dit la aprencio de lu sia ablaviada e la revolucio de aquela.	The part above the canal is to be delicately separated, closed (meaning not perforated), wrapped, and learned about its anatomy and rotation.
E si vols cauteriza la formiga segon que es denant dit en la cauterizacio de atheyl en le capitol de cauteri.	And if you want to cauterize the ant using the method as described in the section on cautery of ants.
De forma dels instrumentz que so aministratz a dar cristeri.	Concerning the tools that are administered for making an incision.
Alcunas veguadas es fayt cristeri de argent o de lato o de eram fondut o malleat; e alcunas veguadas es fayt de aquels instrumentz petit e gran segon aquels als quals so aministratz, quar aquel que es aministrat en la curacio dels petitz enfants sia petit; e de aquel dels quals los culs son freuls o doloyrozes, les cristeris de aquels sian petitz.	Some incisions are made using silver or lead or melted or hammered metal; and some incisions are made with small or large instruments depending on those to whom they are administered, as the one given to a child should be small; and the incisions for the elderly or those who have cold and painful areas should be small.
La forma de cristeri gran e pauc:	The shape of a large and shallow incision:
Le cap de la canula de lu desus en le qual es liada la borsa sia ampla segon aquesta manieyra; e sia a lu distinacio la on la borsa es liada ayssi cum vezes.	The head of the canal above, where the pouch is tied, should be wide according to this method, and it should be clearly distinguished where the pouch is attached in the same manner as sometimes seen.
E la extremitat de lu pus dejus, la qual es entromesa en le cul, sia sorda (so es no-uberta) mot leon, atrasent a subtilita; e en la un del latz de lu sian dos traucs, e en l’autre costat un trauc, e sia la amplesa del trauc segon la groseza dels rays e pus gros un petit.	And the end of the pus below, which penetrates into the anus, should be closed (meaning not opened) in a narrow manner, hidden under subtlety; and in one side there are two cuts, while on the other side one cut, and the width of the cut should correspond to the thickness of the rays and the pus, being smaller for thicker rays and pus.
E sia la borsa en la qual sian pausadas las medicinas de vesica de bestia o de pel de ovelha, e la razit de lu sia un palm.	And the pouch in which medicines from animal bladder or sheep's wool are placed should be about the size of a palm.
E sia perforada per motz traucs ayssi cum es revolvuda; e si l’espazi le qual es entre les traucs la grossetut del dit.	And it should be pierced with multiple cuts in such a manner that it is rolled up, and if the space between the cuts is thick, the width of the cut should correspond to the thickness of the finger.
E aprop entromet en aquels traucs fiel fort de fiel cru le qual sia de detz fiels, o enviro aquels; e ajusta am aquel la borsa; e quan es pausada en lu la borsa, sia streyt en le cap del cristeri entre dos distingentz am fort costriccio, e aprop cristeriza am aquel quascun trauc: Mays la qualitat de cristerizar am aquel es que tu omples la borsa de la medicina, que sia escalfada segon la quantitat de la tolleransa del malaute; e guarda te que no sia trop cauda ni trop freja.	And place it firmly within the strong and sharp needle or surround it; then adjust the pouch accordingly; when the pouch is placed, it should be tight at the head of the incision between two distinct points with a strong constriction, and cauterize each cut: But the quality of cauterizing with this method is that you fill the pouch with medicine that is warmed according to the patient's tolerance; be careful not to make it too hot or too cold.
E aprop le malaute sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos, e eleva las suas cambas en sus e pausa dejos lu un cuer sobre le qual ja so les homes o un lansol; e aprop unta la extramitat del cauteri am oli o am album de huou o am mucellage de fenugrec o de semblantz; e aprop entromet aquel en le cul am facilitat, e aprop le ministre prengua la borsa e exprema aquel am doas mas e essemps am vehemencia entro que sia evacuat en le budelh tot aquo que es en le cristeri; e aprop extra le cristeri e le malaute leva las suas cambas a la paret.	Place the patient on their back and elevate their legs, placing a cushion or pillow under them; then anoint the end of the cauterizing instrument with oil, albumen of egg or mustard or similar; insert it into the anus with ease, and administer the pouch, squeezing it with two hands and exerting pressure forcefully until everything inside the incision is evacuated from the hernia; then remove the incision and the patient raises their legs to the wall.
E si la medicina forsa aquel a eyssiment, tengua le tant quant poyra; e si dorm am aquel per tota una nueyt, es mays derier en juvament.	And if the medicine is forced through this method, it should be sufficient; and if it remains in place for an entire night, it is more effective.
Mays si tu cristerizas aquel en las malautias de solucio de ventre e l’eyssiment de lu le coyta, lahoras tu itera le cauteri entro que sia sanat.	But if you cauterize it in cases of abdominal solution and the issuance of it, then you must reapply the cauterizing tool until it is healed.
E si en le cul so emorroydas o apostemas ledens, lahoras sia le cristeri mot subtil e leon, dels cristeris am les quals les enfantz so criterisatz.	And if there is diarrhea or painful hemorrhoids in the anus, then make a shallow and narrow incision, using the type of incisions that are given to children.
De curacio de las plaguas.	Concerning the treatment of sores.
Yeu ja e dit en la divisio de la curacio de las plaguas aquo que convenia al libre, e yeu dic assi la curacio de aquelas am ma e am medicinas segon le conpliment.	I have already said in the section on treating sores what is appropriate for the free person, and I will now explain the treatment with herbs and medicines according to their nature.
Donc dic que las plaguas son diversificadas segon aquo en que son faytas las plaguas e segon le loc sobre le qual cazo las plaquas.	Therefore, it is said that afflictions are diverse according to what causes them and according to the place where they occur.
E las causas per que motas vetz son faytas las plaguas so ayssi cum getament de peyra, o inscisio d’espaza o de cotel, o percussio am lansa, o am fustz, o am sageta, o semblantz ad aquels de motas causas.	And the causes of various times are those that cause afflictions are such as falling from stones, or incision of space or armor, or striking with a lance, or club, or arrow, or similar to these causes.
Mays las plaguas que so en les locz del cos so ayssi cum plagua la qual catz sobre le cap, o·l col, o·l pietz, o·l ventre, o·l fitge, e semblantz ad aquels dels membres.	But the afflictions that occur in the body are such as an affliction that occurs on the head, neck, feet, stomach, or back, and similar to these members of the body.
E yeu so recomtant la curacio de alcunas plaguas per que pauses aquela ratiocinacio e regla sobre las autras plaguas.	And it is recommended for the treatment of certain afflictions to pause that reasoning and rule over other afflictions.
E yeu comensare de las plaguas del cap simplas, quar la rememoracio de las compostas vindra al comensament del tertz capitol.	And we begin with simple head afflictions, as the complex ones will come at the beginning of the third chapter.
Donc dic que quan accideys en le cap plagua simpla e no es fractura, lahoras considera: si es per getament de peyra o de semblant, e ja ha trinquada la codena tant solament e es gran plagla e temes sobre aquel malaute havinement de apostema caut, lahoras tu te coyta e fleubotoma la cephalica tantost, e no tardas aquo; e extrats ad aquel del sanc segon la quantitat de la vertut de lu si no mes alcuna causa prohibent de fleubotomia, majorment si·l sanc que es eyssit de la plagua es pauc.	Therefore it is said that when a simple head affliction and not a fracture occurs, then consider: if it is due to falling from stones or similar, and the patient has already tied the bandage only and it is a large wound and you fear that the patient may have an abscess forming, then you immediately incise the cephalic vein and do not delay; and extract as much blood as possible according to the strength of the vein, unless any other cause prohibits venesection, especially if the blood that is exuded from the wound is little.
E sia la flaubotomia del contrari de la partida plaguada; e guardase le malaute de replecio e de vi e de viandas grossas.	The venesection should be on the opposite side of the afflicted part; and keep the patient from reflux, vomiting, and heavy food.
Mays si de la minuicio prohibeys alcuna causa, lahoras sia aminorat de la vianda e no apropinque a carn ni a vi.	But if any cause prohibits the reduction, then it should be reduced by reducing food and avoiding meat and wine.
E pausa sobre la plagua, si a lu accideys apostema caut, coto enfus en oli rozat solet o en vi en le qual es stipticat.	And wait for the wound if an abscess forms over it, fill with oil of roses or wine in which it is steeped.
Mays si est segur de apostema caut, lahoras pausa sobre la plagua, si es recent am le sieu sanc e le ayre no ha mudat aquela la polvera la qual yeu recomtare aprop petit.	But if you are certain of the abscess, then wait for the wound if it is new and its air has not changed the powder that I recommend applying cautiously.
E si le ayre ja ha mudada aquela, lahoras pausa sobre alscus enguentz entro que sia sanada.	And if the air has already changed, then wait for some purging until it is healed.
Mays si la plagua es gran o es per inscizio d’espaza e de semblantz, e no so ajustadas las labias de lu per puvils, lahoras ajusta aquelas am sutura segon que yeu recomtare de la sutura de lor.	But if the wound is large or due to incision of space and similar, and the lips are not properly closed, then close them with suture as I recommend for their suture.
Mays si la plagua ja es discuberta del os e pen, e no es retencio de lu sino un petit suspensori, lahoras inscideys aquela e aprop cura la plagua am medicinas e restaura la carn aprop en loc de codena, e comanda al malaute que sia pescut de viandas en las quals es groceza: caps e formen coyt e semblantz a lor, entro que sia compost.	But if the wound is exposed to bone and tendon, and it is not bound but only a small suspensioner, then incise it and treat the wound with medicine and restore the flesh properly covered by bandages, and order the patient to be careful about food that contains meat: fish and fowl, and similar until it heals.
E si atrobas en la codena putrefaccio e no adhereys al os, lahoras tu inscideys tot aquo poyrit e geta aquo, e aprop cura aquo.	And if rot in the bandage putrefaction occurs and does not adhere to the bone, then incise all that protrudes and remove it; and treat it.
Mays si en aquestas plaguas es arteria o vena de la qual fluxs de sanc pot evenir, e no es abscindida per medicinas, lahoras tu inquier sobre la arteria, e si atrobas aquela no-inscidida, lahoras tu inscideys aquela am spatum, o lia aquela; e si necessitat te provoca que aquo que havem dit no comfereys, lahoras tu cauteriza entro que·l sanc sia abscidit.	But if in these afflictions there is an artery or vein from which blood flow may occur and it has not been severed by medicine, then you examine the artery; and if the unsevered one is found, you incise it with a spatula or ligature; and if necessity forces you to do what I have said, you cauterize until the blood is severed.
E si aquestas plaguas son simplas e petitas, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiere; enayssi que tu polverizas sobre aquelas aquesta polvera, quar consolidada aquela denant que l’ayre mude aquelas.	And if these afflictions are simple and small, then the cause of them is light; sprinkle this powder on them, as it will harden before the air changes them.
E la manieyra de la polvera es aquesta: recipe oli de enses partida una, de sanc de drago partida doas, de caus no-extincta partidas tres; sia tot mot trissat e crivellat, e de lu sia la plagua omplida, e sia constrengida per bona constriccio entro que be sobre aquela aderesca, e sia coagulada am le sanc.	And the method of the powder is this: Recipe oil from crushed poppy seeds, dragon blood, and ground cumin; mix all together and sieve it, then fill the wound with it, constrict it properly with a good constriction until it adheres to it, and coagulate with blood.
E aprop strengeys aquela desus am pulvils e leyssa aquela, e no la deslias mentre esta ayssi que no es apostemada, quar no es eredicada de lu la medicina entro que sia sanada.	And apply it strongly on top with a poultice and let it rest like that until it is not an abscess, as the medicine does not penetrate until it is healed.
E alcuna vetz fa aquo sola cautz, quan no es a tu en present enses e sanc de drago.	And sometimes do this alone with cauterization, when there are no poppy seeds and dragon blood available.
E ja fa aquesta meteyssa operacio en las grans plaguas quan conveneys que sia pausada sobre aquelas e sian streytas, e so plaguas recentz am le lor sanc, las quals le ayre no ha alteradas.	And now perform this operation on large wounds when it must be paused and tightened, and only on recently formed wounds whose air has not changed.
E si le ayre las ha alteradas, e majorment quan es en temps d’estiu, lahoras no es entencio a la posicio de aquesta polvera, mays adonc cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit, enayssi que tu pauses sobre aquelas alcus enguents degistius, o que pauses sobre aquelas pols de la farina del ordi am aygua e mel entro que getan poyredura; e aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And if the air has changed them, especially in summer, then it is not advisable to apply this powder, but instead treat them as I have said, that is, wait for some purging or wait for powder made from barley flour and water until they heal; and treat them with other treatment until they are healed.
Mays si accideys am la plagua fractura en os, e es petita, lahoras tu extratz aquo am gesti.	But if a bone fracture occurs in the wound, which is small, then you extract it with forceps.
E yeu diyre la cura de las fracturas del cap en aquo que es envenidor.	And I will say the treatment for head fractures that are poisonous.
De las plaguas del col.	On neck afflictions.
Mays si la plagua accideys en le col, lahoras no es en lu differencia en medicacio, e entre la plagua del cap quan es simpla.	But if the wound occurs in the neck, there is no difference in treatment, and it is like a simple head wound.
Mays si ja le nervi del col es inscis o arteria, lahoras si es nervi, no es en lu engen sino que sia evitada curacio de lu am aquo que fa vehement stipticitat, ayssi cum ziniar e zegi que es vetriol e semblantz a lor quar nozo als nervis e contrazo aquel.	But if the nerves of the neck are incised or an artery, then if it is a nerve, do not engage in its treatment without caution, and avoid any treatment that causes intense stitching, such as zinc and zego which are toxic and harmful to nerves and inhibit healing.
E no pauses sobre la plagua alcuna causa de tot freja, quar la sustancia dels nervis es freja e la continuacio de lu es am le cervel, le qual es le pus aut de totz les membres.	And do not place any pressure on the wound, for the substance of nerves is cold and its continuation is near the brain, which is the head of all members.
E si’ aquo am que es curat de medicinas leugieras, ayssi cum es caus lavada am aygua dousa, alcuna veguada enfusa en oli rozat o no-rozat, e thucia quan es lavada am aygua dousa e las autras peyras minarantz segon aquesta manieyra, e enguentz humitz.	If it is being treated with light medicines, such as washing with sweet water, sometimes immersed in rose oil or not, and when it is washed with sweet water and other remedies are applied according to this method, and gargle with warm water.
Mays si la plagua es gran, lahoras aministra sutura, o coarta las labias de lu, e aprop cura aquela am pulvils entro que sia sanada.	But if the wound is large, administer stitching or sew up its edges, and take care of it with powders until it heals.
Mays si a la plagua es profunditat o accideys en lu a la pus bassa partida poyredura, lahoras perfora aquela en le loc mays depremegut.	But if the wound is deep or pus collects in its lower part, then perforate it at the most depressed point.
Mays si en la plagua ja es inscisa arteria e es conseguit flux de sanc, lahoras separa o secca aquela, o lia aquela, o cauteriza aquela si necessitat te provoca ad aquo.	But if an artery has been cut and there is bleeding in the wound, then separate or tie it off, or cauterize it if necessary.
Mays si ja ha insciditz les spondils del golayro o tot, e so salvadas las venas del col, lahoras tu ajusta las labias de la codena am sutura sobre la cana del golayro e no toques aquel; abantz egala aquel e reduzeys aquel sobre la sua figura natural, e aprop strenh aquel am strectura decent, e leyssa aquela per alcus jorns; e aprop cura aquel am enguentz en les quals es stipticitat e excitacio entro que sia sanat.	But if the spinal bones have been cut or not, and the vessels of the neck are saved, then you adjust the edges of the wound on the neck with suturing around the base of the skull and do not touch it; move it gently and reduce it to its natural shape, and strengthen it with a proper structure, and leave it for several days; take care of it with stimulating and exciting powders until it is healed.
Mays si la plagua ja en le os a fayta enprecio, lahoras percuireys aquela, e lahoras si en lu ha fragmentz de hos, extratz totz aquels que podes de lor; e aquo que a tu no es apparelhat, leyssa aquo entro que la plagua se poyrisca, e sia separat e la egrecio de lu sia alleujada.	But if the wound has affected bone, then you percuss it, and if there are fragments of bone in it, remove all that you can; leave what is not appropriate until the wound dries up, and separate and the granulation of it should be relieved.
E si la plagua es recent lahoras polveriza sobre aquela polvera la qual t’e recomtada.	And if the wound is recent, sprinkle powder on it that has been recommended to you.
Mays si en la plagua es fayta fistula, lahoras cura aquela am aquo del qual la rememoracio vindra aprop en le sieu capitol.	But if a fistula is formed in the wound, treat it with what will come to your memory in its own chapter.
De las plaguas del col o de semblantz quan fayta entre las spallas e es fayta am spaza o am cotel o am lansa o am semblantz.	Of wounds on the neck or similar, when formed between the shoulders and cut with a knife, a sword, a lance, or something similar.
Si es percussio de lansa o de cotel, e vezes de lu la profunditat, lahoras considera mays si de la plagua yeys ventositat quan le malaute elena; lahoras sapias que la plagua es mortal.	If it is a wound caused by a lance or sword, and sometimes deep, consider whether the wound is accompanied by wind when the patient complains of it; then know that the wound is fatal.
E si en lu no es profunditat e la plagua es recent am le sieu sanc, lahoras tu pauses en lu de la primieyra horo polvera, e no strenhas aquel per que no sia le sanc retengut en la profunditat de lu e que retorne al cor e que aucigua le malaute, mays pausa en lu enguent atractiu, e deslia aquela doas veguadas le dia.	And if it is not deep and the wound is recent with little blood, then wait for the first hour to sprinkle powder on it, and do not press it so as not to keep the blood in the depth of it and return to the heart and aggravate the patient, but wait until it has attracted pus, and remove it every other day.
E si l’enguent no es a tu present, lahoras tu pausa en le orrifici de la plagua coto viel per que sucque aquo que yeys de las humiditatz; e fay que le malaute dorma sobre la plagua per que corra aquo que es en lu ajustat.	And if the pus is not present, then wait for the orifice of the wound to open up so that the blood can drain from the humors; and make the patient sleep on the wound so that what is in it will settle.
Mays si ja de la plagua son passatz tres dias o mays e no accideys al malaute spasme ni tremor de cor mal ni strictura de ale, e vezes las autras dispozicios bonas de lu, lahoras sapias que plagua es salva; e adonc cura aquela am calguas e am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanada.	But if three days or more have passed and the patient does not have spasms, tremors of the heart, palpitations, or other good conditions of it, then know that the wound is healed; and then treat it with heat and other treatments until it is healed.
Mays si la sanacio de lu es excusada, e ja tot temps es uberta, lahoras sapias que ja es fayta fistula; cura donc aquela per le sieu capitol.	But if the healing of it is excused and it has been open for a long time, then know that a fistula has formed; treat it according to its own chapter.
E si la plagua es per inscisio de spaza o de cotel, e es simpla en la superficia del pietz o del dos, lahoras cura aquela am aquo que es precedit de sutura, si es gran, o am polvera, si es petita.	And if the wound is caused by a knife or sword, and is simple on the surface of the foot or back, then treat it with what is prescribed before stitching (if large) or powder (if small).
Mays si ja ha fayta enprecio en le os, e so ja de lu inscizas pessas, lahoras tu torqua la plagua e coyta ad extrayre aquelas pessas, si so separadas.	But if the wound has affected bone and there are separated pieces of it, then twist the wound and try to extract those pieces.
Mays si no so separadas, lahoras leyssa las entro que se poyresca la plagua, que la extraccio de lor es alleujada.	If they are not separated, then leave them until the wound dries up, for the extraction of them is relieved.
E de las autras plaguas accidentz en les autres membres le juvament en curacio es le juvament de aquo que havem dit.	And in other accidents on other members, the help in treatment is the same as what has been said.
De las plaguas del ventre.	Of stomach wounds.
L’indisposicio la qual accideys en le ventre es o gran, o pauc, o migiera.	The indisposition that occurs in the abdomen can be large, small, or medium-sized.
De la gran alcunas veguadas yeys le budel o nervi del budel, per que es fayta intromissio de lor e la sutura de lor esser pus vehement e pus subtil.	A large abdominal indisposition may sometimes be due to the intestine or its nerve, for which an introduction of them and their suturing should be more violent and subtle.
E disrupcio petita es fayta dificil per autra manieyra, e siec se que la reduccio de lor es pus dificil, si no te coytes de la intromissio de lor al sieu loc tantost, quar se ubre e es engrossat per que le intrament de lu es fayt difficil.	A small disruption can be difficult in other ways, and know that its reduction is more difficult, if you do not take care to introduce it into its place as soon as possible, for it swells up and becomes bloated, making the introduction of it difficult.
E donc la milhor disrupcio es migiera, quar en aquela no es dificil la reduccio del budel, ayssi cum es dificil en las doas specias denant ditas.	And therefore, the best disruption is medium-sized, for in this case, the reduction of the intestine is not difficult, as it is in the two cases mentioned above.
E sapias que sutura del ventre es segon quatre manieyras, mays doas suturas son comunas que conveneysso en suturas de las autras plaguas del cors.	You should know that abdominal stitching can be done in four ways, but two of them are common and are used for other wounds on the body.
E duas autras suturas proprias comunican a las autras plaguas, mays empero so mays proprias en la sutura del ventre.	Two other stitching methods are specific to other wounds, but they are more specific to abdominal stitching.
E yeu recomti a tu quascuna am exposicio e declaracio.	I recommend to you exposure and explanation.
Donc dic que quan la plagua es petita e es eyssit alcuna causa del budel per aquela, e es fayt dificil a reduzir aquel, lahoras aquo es en una de doas manieyras: o per parvitat de la disrupcio ayssi cum havem dit, o quan al budel es venguda inflacio per la frigiditat de l’ayre.	Therefore, you say that if the wound is small and there has been a cause for the intestine by it, and reducing the intestine is difficult, then this can be in one of two ways: either due to the small disruption as mentioned above, or when the intestine has swelled up due to the coldness of the air.
E donc quan aquo es ayssi, lahora cove que tu scalfes aquel enayssi que tu submerges una sponga ho drap humit en aygua tebeza sola, o que coguas en aygua squinant, e cyperum, e spic, e embroques am aquela le budel entro que la imflacio sia resolvuda.	And so when this is the case, it is necessary that you heat up that area and immerse a sponge or damp cloth in hot water alone, or cook it in hot water, and cyperus, spike, and bindings into that which goes inside to resolve the inflammation.
E alcunas veguadas fa aquo vi en le qual ha stipticitat, e es milhor que la aygua sola en resolucio de la imflacio.	In some cases, this situation is accompanied by stiffness, and it is better that water alone be used to resolve the inflammation.
E donc cum tu vezes la imflacio esser resolvuda, lahoras tu humecta le budel am aygua en la qual es coyta altea e malvas, quar per aquo es alleujat le intrament de lu am pauca causa.	And since you see the inflammation being resolved, then you moisten the intestine with water containing elder and mallow, because by this means is the intestinal pain alleviated with little effort.
Mays si es escusat le intrament de lu aprop aquesta curacio, lahoras scindeys la disrupcio un petit am strument am le qual so inscididas emorroydas.	But if the intestine is excluded from this treatment, then you cut the hernia with a small instrument using which you make incisions into the abscesses.
E la curacio primieyra es milhor, quan es propriada que no es seccio, e no sia occupacio a seccar aprop necessitat e defaliment.	The primary cure is better when it is appropriate that it not be cut, and there should not be an intention to cut when necessary and lacking resources.
Del instrument, sec se la forma de lu:	Of the instrument, take its shape:
La una partida de lu torta aguda, e l’autra partida no-acuta, e la extremitat subtil, e no sia am la subtilitat de spatum, abantz sia obtusa un pauc.	The sharp angle of the tool should be acute, and the other part should not be blunt. Its tip should be subtle, but not as subtle as a spatula's tip; it should have an obtuse edge to some extent.
E donc cum la plagua es amplificada e yeys fora le budel, lahoras cove que la sua reduccio sia segon la forma de lu natural, en le sieu loc propri, si es possible sobre aquo, quar milhor es.	And so when the wound is widened and the intestine protrudes, it is necessary that its reduction should be in accordance with its natural form, at its proper location if possible, because this is better.
Mays quan la disrupcio es ampla, e es en la partida pu bassa del ventre, lahoras cove que tu fassas jazer le malaute sobre le sieu dos, e pausa las suas cambas pus autas que·l sieu cap; e si es en la partida pus desus del ventre, lahoras tu pause le cap de lu e·l pietz pus autz que las partidas dejos.	But when the hernia is wide and in the lower part of the abdomen, you should make the patient lie on their back, with their legs bent as far as their head; and if it is above the abdomen, then you should raise the patient's head and legs to the same extent as the affected area.
E semblantment si la disrupcio es en una de las doas partz del ventre, lahoras pausa la tua entencio e la tua consideracio tostemps en aysso per que la partida en la qual es la plagua sia pus auta que l’autra.	Similarly, if the hernia is in one of the two parts of the abdomen, then you should pause your intention and consideration always on this so that the affected area is more elevated than the other.
E ayssi cove que tu aministres aquo en las plaguas grans e en las plaguas migieras.	So it is necessary that you treat both large wounds and small wounds.
E en las plaguas petitas, pausa aquo que es a tu preparat, e aprop fay que·l ministre sia entre las tuas mas pyatados, le qual tengua la disrupcio tota am la sua ma e ajusta las labias de lu, e aprop descuebre de aquela ad aquel que siec la sutura alcuna causa aprop autra.	In small wounds, pause what is prepared, and make sure that the assistant who will administer it is among your most trusted, who will hold the hernia completely with his hand and adjust the lips of it, and uncover from one side to the other the area where suturing may be required due to another cause.
E aquesta es la manieyra de sutura comuna: una que prenguas la agula, o comte de agula segon la cantitat de la amplitut de la plagua; e aprop layssa de la extremitat de la disrupcio del dit anular, e strenh la agula una, otre que tu no metas fiel en las doas extremitatz de la codena, am doas extremitatz del ciphac que es dejos la codena de las partidas dedintz, entro que fassas aquela penetrar de aquela partida; e tu ja has agreguadas doas extremitatz de la codena e doas extremitatz del ciphac, e so faytas quatre ordes.	This is the common method of suturing: one that you take the needle, or count the number of needles according to the size of the wound; and approach it from the edge of the hernia of the thumb, tightening the needle one time, without putting thread in both ends of the knot, with two ends of the cord on both sides of the inner parts, penetrating through that part; and you have already tied both ends of the cord and the suturing is made in four orders.
E aprop strenh am fiel doble en le circuit de la agula, e alcunas veguadas de doas partz ensemps, e aprop agregua las doas labias e la plagua per agreguacio decent; e aprop layssa la grossitut del dit e fiqua una autra agulha en aquela, e aprop lia aquela am fiel ayssi cum fiest am la primieyra agulha; e no cesses far aquo si es necessitat am las agulhas entro que ajas complida tota la contriccio de la plagua.	And tighten the thread double around the needle, and sometimes from two sides at once, and gather both lips and the wound through appropriate stitching; and leave the thickness of the finger and insert another needle into it, and tie it in the same way as the first needle; do not stop doing this if necessary with needles until you have completed the contraction of the wound.
E sian las agulhas migieras entre groceza e subtilitat, quar las agulhas subtils mot leugierament insciden la carn; e las grossas so de dificil intrament en la codena, e donc per aquo cove que sian migieras en subtilitat e grosseza.	Needles should be neither too thick nor too thin, because thin needles pierce the flesh lightly; and large needles are difficult to pass through the cord, so therefore they should be of a medium thickness.
E no cove que la agulha sia ficada en doas extremitatz de la codena propdana mot, per so que la carn no sia inscidida leugierament e que la plagua se huebra devant la sua consolidacio.	It is not necessary that the needle be inserted into both ends of the cord closely together, because this would pierce the flesh lightly and the wound would break down before its consolidation.
E no sian prolonguadas de sutura per que la plagua no sia prohibida de consolidacio.	Do not prolong the suturing so that the wound is prevented from consolidating.
E aprop inscideys las extremitatz de las agulhas per so que no ledescan le malaute deves le sieu dormier; e pausaras sobre la sutura pulvils expanduts de tota partida, les quals tenguan las extremitatz de las agulhas; e layssa aquelas entro que sapias que la plagua ja es consolidada.	Insert the tips of the needles so as not to hurt the patient while they sleep; and pause on the suture with expanded pulp from all sides, which hold the tips of the needles; leave it until you know that the wound has consolidated.
E aquestas specias de sutura am agulhas en cal manieyra es pus convenient en las plaguas petitas, quar habasta en la sutura de lor una agulha o doas o entorn aquelas.	These types of suturing with needles in this manner are more suitable for small wounds, because they require only one needle or two around the wound.
Mays la segonda sutura es cominal: e es que tu aministres am sutura las quatre extremitatz, de la codena e doas extremitatz del ciphac, en una veguada, am agulha en la qual sia fiel envolopat engual en subtilitat e grosseza.	But the second suture is common: you administer four parts with the suturing, of the cord and two ends of the thread, in one go, with a needle that should be wrapped in both thickness and thinness.
E aprop quan am la agulha auras penetrat aquestas quatre extremitatz, reduzeys la agulha de aquela meteyssa partida de la qual comensest, per so que le fiel retrayt caja de la pus subirana partida a la plagua, per so que la sutura sia segon sutura de drap am la qual les draps so strengutz.	And when you have penetrated these four parts with the needle, reduce the needle from that side of the starting point, so that the thread draws up the inflamed part of the wound towards the healthy part, so that the suture is like a seam with which the cloth is strengthened.
E pausa entre quascuna sutura la quantitat del gros del dit mendre.	Pause between each stitch the thickness of the little finger.
E aquesta sutura sabo les homes.	This suture is known to men.
